entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@GOP @WhiteHouse COVID-19 testing was needed BECAUSE of the problems with 45
We had problems with not having enough ventilators, BECAUSE of the incompetence of 45
We had problems with PPE supplies BECAUSE Trump allowed COVID-19 to ravage our country.
130,000 people died of COVID-19 BECAUSE of 45!
